00046 OutgoingClientTest::setOutgoingQueueTest()
00047 {
00048     RequestQueue* queue = new RequestQueue();
00049     RequestQueue* new_queue = new RequestQueue();
00050     OutgoingClient* client = new OutgoingClient(queue);
00051

00053

00057 void
00058 OutgoingClientTest::addServerTest()
00059 {
00060     // Set up the listening server
00061     int port = 9090;
00062     pthread_t serverThread;
00063     RequestQueue* queue = new RequestQueue();
00064 
00065     shared_ptr<RemoteRequestManagerHandler> handler(new RemoteRequestManagerHandler(queue));
00066     shared_ptr<TProcessor> processor(new RemoteRequestManagerProcessor(handler));
00067     shared_ptr<TServerTransport> transport(new TServerSocket(port));
00068     shared_ptr<TTransportFactory> transportFactory(new TBufferedTransportFactory());
00069     shared_ptr<TProtocolFactory> protocolFactory(new TBinaryProtocolFactory());
00070 
00071     TSimpleServer *testServer = new TSimpleServer(processor,
00072                                               transport,
00073                                               transportFactory,
00074                                               protocolFactory);
00075     pthread_create(&serverThread, NULL, runServer, (void*) testServer);
00076     sleep(1);
00077 
00078     // Set up the client
00079     OutgoingClient* client = new OutgoingClient(queue);
00080     int32_t serverId = 1;
00081     std::vector<int32_t> serviceIds;
00082     serviceIds.push_back(2);
00083     std::string serverAddress = "localhost";
00084     int32_t serverPort = 9090;
00085 
00086     client->addServer(serverId, serviceIds, serverAddress, serverPort);
00087 
00088     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(client != NULL);
00089 
00090     delete testServer;
00091 }
00092

00094 OutgoingClientTest::removeServerTest()
00095 {
00096     int port = 9191;
00097     pthread_t serverThread;
00098     RequestQueue* queue = new RequestQueue();
00099 
00100     shared_ptr<RemoteRequestManagerHandler> handler(new RemoteRequestManagerHandler(queue));
00101     shared_ptr<TProcessor> processor(new RemoteRequestManagerProcessor(handler));
00102     shared_ptr<TServerTransport> transport(new TServerSocket(port));
00103     shared_ptr<TTransportFactory> transportFactory(new TBufferedTransportFactory());
00104     shared_ptr<TProtocolFactory> protocolFactory(new TBinaryProtocolFactory());
00105 
00106     TSimpleServer *testServer = new TSimpleServer(processor,
00107                                               transport,
00108                                               transportFactory,
00109                                               protocolFactory);
00110     pthread_create(&serverThread, NULL, runServer, (void*) testServer);
00111     sleep(1);
00112 
00113     OutgoingClient* client = new OutgoingClient(queue);
00114     int32_t serverId = 1;
00115     std::vector<int32_t> serviceIds;
00116     serviceIds.push_back(2);
00117     std::string serverAddress = "localhost";
00118     int32_t serverPort = 9191;
00119 
00120     client->addServer(serverId, serviceIds, serverAddress, serverPort);
00121 
00122     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(client != NULL);
00123 
00124     client->removeServer(serverId);
00125 
00126     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(client != NULL);
00127     delete testServer;

00130 void
00131 OutgoingClientTest::runTest()
00132 {
00133     RequestQueue* queue = new RequestQueue();
00134     OutgoingClient* client = new OutgoingClient(queue);
00135 
00136     pthread_t clientThread;
00137 
00138     pthread_create(&clientThread, NULL, runClient, (void*) client);
00139 
00140     sleep(1);
00141     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(client != NULL);
00142 
00143     // This should return immediately
00144     client->run();
00145     client->shutdown();
00146 }

00148 void
00149 OutgoingClientTest::processOutgoingQueueTest()
00150 {
00151     // Set up the client
00152     RequestQueue* queue = new RequestQueue();
00153     OutgoingClient* client = new OutgoingClient(queue);
00154     pthread_t clientThread;
00155 
00156     pthread_create(&clientThread, NULL, runClient, (void*) client);
00157 
00158     sleep(1);
00159     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(client != NULL);
00160 
00161     client->run();
00162         
00163     // Set up the server
00164     pthread_t serverThread;
00165     RequestQueue* iqueue = new RequestQueue();
00166     int32_t port = 9292;
00167     shared_ptr<RemoteRequestManagerHandler> handler(new RemoteRequestManagerHandler(iqueue));
00168     shared_ptr<TProcessor> processor(new RemoteRequestManagerProcessor(handler));
00169     shared_ptr<TServerTransport> transport(new TServerSocket(port));
00170     shared_ptr<TTransportFactory> transportFactory(new TBufferedTransportFactory());
00171     shared_ptr<TProtocolFactory> protocolFactory(new TBinaryProtocolFactory());
00172 
00173     TSimpleServer *testServer = new TSimpleServer(processor,
00174                                               transport,
00175                                               transportFactory,
00176                                               protocolFactory);
00177     pthread_create(&serverThread, NULL, runServer, (void*) testServer);
00178     sleep(1);
00179 
00180     // Add the server to the client
00181     int32_t serverId = 1;
00182     std::vector<int32_t> serviceIds;
00183     serviceIds.push_back(2);
00184     client->addServer(serverId, serviceIds, "localhost", port);
00185 
00186     // Add an item to the client's queue
00187     queueItem item;
00188     item.methodId = 1;
00189     item.serverId = 1;
00190     queue->addItem(2, &item);
00191 
00192     // Give it time to process
00193     sleep(1);
00194     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(queue->getItemQueue(2).size() == 0);
00195 
00196     client->shutdown();
00197     delete testServer;
00198 }
